case_header.outcome: Successful Discharge to Home with HHA

clinical_barriers: Wound status initially deemed ineligible for home care by Medical Director

bureaucratic_steps: Wound nurse notification of discharge date
Medical Director review and reversal of eligibility

timeline_deltas.context: The patient and daughter follow a recurring 30-day admission cycle; discharge was set for 11/25 from admission.

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Medical Director initially denied home care based on 75% healing threshold.
reasoning_trace_triples.intent: Verify clinical eligibility for service conversion.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Medical Director reversed decision same-day due to readmission risk (Frequent Flyer history).

reasoning_trace_triples.situation: Patient unable to communicate or make decisions.
reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Coordinated exclusively with daughter and SNF wound nurse.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Successful transport arrangement and handoff to home care.

reasoning_trace_triples.action_taken: Queried Regional Director for increased frequency.
reasoning_trace_triples.intent: Readmission prevention and advocacy for clinical necessity.
reasoning_trace_triples.result: Request denied; limited to 1x/week per agency policy at the time.

rank_1_best_practices.context: Patient history of recurrent failure at home.
rank_1_best_practices.action: Challenging the standard visit frequency (1x/week) with the Regional Director.
rank_1_best_practices.rationale: Attempting to advocate for clinical sufficiency to prevent the next readmission.

rank_1_best_practices.context: Doctor vacillating on ordering home care.
rank_1_best_practices.action: Monitoring the Medical Director's decision-making process for readmission prevention.
rank_1_best_practices.rationale: Ensuring the patient's 'Frequent Flyer' status was factored into the risk assessment.

rank_0_boundary_failures.context: Recurring 30-day admissions due to potential caregiver burnout.
rank_0_boundary_failures.action: N/A - PN stated they could not answer/flag for Social Work.
rank_0_boundary_failures.error_type: Passive - Identified as outside PN scope by the user/system protocol despite clinical relevance.

rank_0_boundary_failures.context: Validation of benefit-driven length of stay (maxing out 30 days).
rank_0_boundary_failures.action: Accepting the 30-day date without clinical challenge.
rank_0_boundary_failures.error_type: Passive - PN accepted facility-driven timeline without questioning clinical necessity vs. benefit duration.

unscripted_chaos_signals: Frequent Flyer / Cycle of SNF bounce-backs
Internal agency policy confusion regarding visit frequency (1x/week vs. one-time visit)
Geographic spread of staff ('Stretched out' providers)
